name: paper party pack (vintage ephemera)
description:
Back by popular demand-- Kitschy’s famous packs of paper!

These scrap packs are made with love using handpicked items from my personal collection of vintage ephemera.

This particular pack features 100 different treats and treasures  in all shapes & sizes!

What you’ll find inside:
* vintage photographs
* map remnants
* children’s book illustrations
* decorative paper
* vintage magazine clippings
* old advertisements
* souvenirs/postcards
* 1960s comic strips
* 1970s t-shirt transfers
* postage stamps
* 1970s board game cards
* whimsical bits & pieces
* various other antique ephemera

These are fun for anybody who loves collecting things from the past and are perfect for use in crafting, scrap booking, journaling, altered art, mixed media art, collaging, handmade cards, decoupaging and much more!

All items are original vintage items, not copies, reprints or print-outs.  These packs are unique so you never know what you’re going to find inside so if you buy multiple packs you will receive a totally different variety of the above mentioned items each time. Neato!

Note : Since each pack of paper is one-of-a- kind, the actual bag you will receive may or may not be the exact one pictured, but will be very similar.
